original_text: Or those eighteen who died when the tower in Siloam fell on them—do you think they were more guilty than all the others living in Jerusalem?
korean_text: 또 실로암에서 망대가 무너져 치어 죽은 열여덟 사람이 예루살렘에 거한 다른 모든 사람보다 죄가 더 있는 줄 아느냐

sentences.original_text: when the tower in Siloam fell on them
do you think they were more guilty
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들이 더 죄가 많았다고 생각합니까

sentences.original_text: than all the others living in Jerusalem?
